TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DriveListBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 使用户能够在运行时选择有效的磁盘驱动器。

span.span: Enables a user to select a valid disk drive at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此控件以显示用户的系统中的所有有效的驱动器的列表。Use this control to display a list of all the valid drives in a user's system. 您可以创建使用户能够从任何可用的驱动器中的磁盘上的文件的列表中打开文件的对话框。You can create dialog boxes that enable the user to open a file from a list of files on a disk in any available drive. 如果还显示并控件，可以编写代码以将它们与同步`DriveListBox`控件以及相互。If you also display the and controls, you can write code to synchronize them with the `DriveListBox` control and with each other. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`DriveListBox`控件使用户能够在运行时选择有效的磁盘驱动器。A `DriveListBox` control enables a user to select a valid disk drive at run time. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 控件使用的非托管资源，还可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a control and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`释放参数设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`. 当处置参数为`true`，此方法释放此控件引用任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当您重写，请确保不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

span.span: When you override , make sure not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 运行时获取或设置选定的驱动器。

span.span: Gets or sets the selected drive at run time.

value.span: 一个指定选定驱动器的 表达式。

span.span: A expression that specifies the selected drive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关有效的驱动器`Drive`属性包括所有驱动器中存在或连接到系统时，创建或刷新在运行时该控件。The valid drives for the `Drive` property include all drives present in or connected to the system when the control is created or refreshed at run time. 默认设置`Drive`属性是当前驱动器。The default setting of the `Drive` property is the current drive. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ComboBoxStyle DropDownStyle { System::Windows::Forms::ComboBoxStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ComboBoxStyle value); };
member this.DropDownStyle : System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指定 组合框样式的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the style of a combo box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DropDownStyle`属性控制向用户显示的接口。The `DropDownStyle` property controls the interface that is presented to the user. 可以输入一个值，提供了简单下拉列表框中，始终显示列表、 下拉列表框中，其中的文本部分不可编辑，并且你必须选择一个箭头，查看下拉列表或默认值下拉列表框中，其中的文本部分是编辑可以，用户必须按箭头键可以查看的列表。You can enter a value that provides a simple drop-down list box, where the list always appears, a drop-down list box, where the text portion is not editable and you must select an arrow to view the drop-down, or the default drop-down list box, where the text portion is editable and the user must press the arrow key to view the list. 若要始终显示用户无法编辑的列表，请使用控件。To always display a list that the user cannot edit, use a control. 如果您设置`DropDownStyle`属性设置为，可以从列表中选择有效的值。If you set the `DropDownStyle` property to , you can select only valid values from the list. 如果您设置`DropDownStyle`属性设置为，可以键入任何值的可编辑区域中。If you set the `DropDownStyle` property to , you can type any value in the editable area of the . > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnBackColorChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnBackColorChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). `OnBackColorChanged`方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The `OnBackColorChanged` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 当您重写在派生类中，请务必调用方法的基类以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, be sure to call the method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). `OnDrawItem`方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The `OnDrawItem` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请确保调用方法的基类以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure to call the method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 强制控件使其工作区无效并立即重绘自己。

span.span: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 当您重写在派生类中，请确保调用方法，以便该控件及其子控件无效并重绘它们。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, make sure to call the method so the control and its child controls are invalidated and redrawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不应设置为控件; 它仅为了控件继承自。This property should not be set for the control; it is provided only because the control inherits from . > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void WndProc (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub WndProc (ByRef m As Message)

param.name: m
param.span: 要处理的 Windows 消息。

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有消息都发送到`WndProc`方法通过筛选之后方法。All messages are sent to the `WndProc` method after being filtered through the method. `WndProc` 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。The `WndProc` method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅`WindowProc`函数中的 Windows Platform SDK 参考的文档位于[MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=98124) Web 站点。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located on the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=98124) Web site. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

para.span: 继承控件应调用基类来处理它们不处理任何消息的方法。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the method for the base class to process any messages that they do not handle.

related.span: SaveFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
OpenFileDialog 组件概述（Windows 窗体）
